citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:45am on 12-JUL-
23. A family member stated the licensee was at work and not available for inspection.
End Section
